channel.title: Goat Cheese on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: Mac and Goat
item.description: Mac and Goat calls for goat cheese; we generally use a goat gouda or a goat cheddar, both of which are usually available at the local Trader Joe’s. Feel free to substitute any hard cheese that melts well in your recipe. The dish also calls for rice pasta, but again feel free to substitute; you’re aiming for something like a rotini which handles the sauce well. Preheat oven to 375 degrees.
